label: Very fine dust
description: Health Concern levels of very fine dust sensor measurements.

supportedVeryFineDustValues.label: Supported very fine dust values
supportedVeryFineDustValues.description: The list of very fine dust health concern values that the device supports. Is optional, defaults to all values if not set.

veryFineDustHealthConcern.label: Very fine dust
veryFineDustHealthConcern.description: Current health concern of very fine dust -- also refered to as PM1.0, based on the relative health hazard
